column2: If you disable the Magento cron you must add [Magento root]/shell/extendware/ewdeferredindexing/process.php to your cron.

column2: Indexes must be in manual mode and you must do an action (such as saving a product) that triggers an indexing event

column1: Process order processes each process sequentially by processing their events. Event order processes each event sequentially by calling each related process on the event.
column2: Process order processes each process sequentially by processing their events. Event order processes each event sequentially by calling each related process on the event.
